detectors.description:
UNIV_ERC20.tokenSale(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIV_ERC20.sol#154-176) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-_price = _eth / sPrice (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIV_ERC20.sol#160)
	-_tkns = sChunk * _price (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/UNIV_ERC20.sol#161)
